We attend many local and national events organised by individual schools and colleges, local careers services and UCAS. Our representatives will be happy to talk to you about entry requirements for our courses, our facilities, accommodation and student life in Leeds. Find out about Trinity &
Come and see us at any of the following major conventions (in date order).
Cardiff (National Indoor Athletics, UWIC)
Central London (Business Design Centre)
Staffordshire (Sir Stanley Matthews Sports Ctr)
West Midlands (Aston University Campus)
Getting the most from HE Conventions.
East London (Queen Mary, Uni of London)
West London (National Hall, Olympia)
